entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.8°C

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
